  • Field Details

    • updater

      protected AnimationHandler updater
      Eventual animation updater to be used

    • positions

      protected List<javafx.util.Pair<javafx.geometry.Point3D,Double>> positions
      Collection of ending positions to go with the animation process. The pair represents the point where the object should go and the step that should do every cycle

    • addAnimationPosition

      public void addAnimationPosition(javafx.geometry.Point3D point, double speed)
      This method adds a step of animation to the queue
      Parameters:
      point - The point to reach
      speed - The speed needed

    • updateAnimation

      public void updateAnimation()
      Method called to update every object animation if there is one. If not overrided the update animation makes a step forward to the next position inside the array of positions
